flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 60300 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=60300>>60300
He has 15400 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 60300 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<60300-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=15400>>15400
He needs to walk an average of 7700 on Friday and Saturday because 15400 / 2 = <<15400/2=7700>>7700
#### 7700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63000, not 60300. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
